title: Advanced Targeting System + Camera Manager
description: Easy plug and play solution for targeting logic. Multiple targeting type available.
longDescription:
*This plugin is included in Ascent Combat Framework! *


Advanced Targeting System is a C++ plug in that adds targeting logic to your game.

 Is designed do be extremely easy to use but yet giving you the possibility to hugely configure how it works.

 

ATS supports different targeting system: Lock camera on target, tunable Magnetic Snap Camera on target, lock single axis or don't lock camera at all.

 

ATS allow to setup multiple target points inside a single actor by instancing multiple Target Points Components, when the camera is locked, it will focus on the specified component (so you can add multiple target points like head/ weak points).

 

Allow to add custom filters a runtime (ES: you want to target a NPCs and important objects if you are not in battle, but only enemies when you are fighting).

 

Supports both Souls Like targeting and snap-only targeting like for modern TPSs.

 

Multiplayer ready. 

All is exposed to Blueprints, no need to know C++!


Video Sample: https://youtu.be/aBZG-4LnW8Q


**INCLUDES CINEMATIC CAMERA MANAGER**

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Multiple target Logics:
  • Lock Camera target
  • Magnetic Snap On Target
  • Select without Locking
  • Supports multiple target points on single actor
  • Select the exact point to snap/lock camera
  • Supports Lock on Yaw Only
  • Add target filters at runtime
  • Optimized C++ implementation
  • Supports multiplayer natively
  • Cinematic Camera manager

Code Modules: ATS runtime

Number of Blueprints: 4

Number of C++ Classes: 10

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows 64, VR, Ps4, Xbox One.

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows 64, VR, Ps4, Xbox One.
